51-year-old.context: The patient is a 51-year-old Caucasian female with a history of a nasopharyngeal mass discovered with patient's chief complaint of nasal congestion and chronic ear disease.

Caucasian.context: The patient is a 51-year-old Caucasian female with a history of a nasopharyngeal mass discovered with patient's chief complaint of nasal congestion and chronic ear disease.

nasopharyngeal mass.context: The patient is a 51-year-old Caucasian female with a history of a nasopharyngeal mass discovered with patient's chief complaint of nasal congestion and chronic ear disease.

nasal congestion.context: The patient is a 51-year-old Caucasian female with a history of a nasopharyngeal mass discovered with patient's chief complaint of nasal congestion and chronic ear disease.

chronic ear disease.context: The patient is a 51-year-old Caucasian female with a history of a nasopharyngeal mass discovered with patient's chief complaint of nasal congestion and chronic ear disease.

right upper lid skin lesion.context: The patient also has had this right upper lid skin lesion which appears to be a cholesterol granuloma for numerous months.

cholesterol granuloma.context: The patient also has had this right upper lid skin lesion which appears to be a cholesterol granuloma for numerous months.

functional endoscopic sinus surgery.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, excision of nasopharyngeal mass via endoscopic technique, and excision of right upper lid skin lesion 1 cm in diameter with adjacent tissue transfer closure.

excision of nasopharyngeal mass.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, excision of nasopharyngeal mass via endoscopic technique, and excision of right upper lid skin lesion 1 cm in diameter with adjacent tissue transfer closure.

excision of right upper lid skin lesion.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, excision of nasopharyngeal mass via endoscopic technique, and excision of right upper lid skin lesion 1 cm in diameter with adjacent tissue transfer closure.

less than 30 cc blood loss.context: Estimated Blood Loss: Less than 30 cc.

1% lidocaine with epinephrine.context: The right upper eyelid skin lesion was injected with 1% lidocaine with epinephrine 1:100,000 approximately 1 cc total.

cocaine-soaked cottonoids.context: The patient's bilateral nasal passages were then packed with cocaine-soaked cottonoids of 10% solution of 4 cc total.

severely deviated nasal septum.context: The patient had a severely deviated nasal septum more so to the right than the left.

spur on the left inferior aspect.context: There appeared to be a spur on the left inferior aspect and also on the right posterior aspect.

spur on the right posterior aspect.context: There appeared to be a spur on the left inferior aspect and also on the right posterior aspect.

polypoid lymphoid tissue.context: The nasopharyngeal mass appeared polypoid in nature almost lymphoid tissue looking.

XPS blade.context: The lesion was then removed on the right side with the XPS blade.

monopolar cauterization.context: The ________ was then hemostatically controlled with monopolar cauterization.

running #6-0 Prolene suture.context: The patient's skin was then reapproximated with a running #6-0 Prolene suture.

Mastisol.context: A Mastisol along with a single Steri-Strip was in place followed Maxitrol ointment.

Steri-Strip.context: A Mastisol along with a single Steri-Strip was in place followed Maxitrol ointment.

Maxitrol ointment.context: A Mastisol along with a single Steri-Strip was in place followed Maxitrol ointment.

Floxin drops.context: If there is any ear drainage, please use the Floxin drops.

Keflex 500 mg.context: The patient will be sent home with a prescription for Keflex 500 mg one p.o. b.i.d, and Tylenol #3 one to two p.o. q.4-6h. pain #30.

Tylenol #3.context: The patient will be sent home with a prescription for Keflex 500 mg one p.o. b.i.d, and Tylenol #3 one to two p.o. q.4-6h. pain #30.
